item.title: [Python] 2019 edition: Trend analysis of unauthorized access (example of general-purpose server on cloud)
item.description: #Introduction This article was posted as day 23 of Cisco Systems Japan Advent Calendar 2018 by Cisco colleagues. 2017: https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2017/cisco 2018 version: https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2018/cisco 2019 version: https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/cisco I think that many network/infrastructure/server engineers have built a home lab. I had an actual machine at home like that for a few years, but I stopped having equipment at home about a year and a half ago and moved to multiple cloud services.
